snippet: President Salva Kiir said that soldiers loyal to the former vice president had tried to orchestrate a coup but that his government was firmly in control.
abstract: South Sudanese Pres Salva Kiir says that soldiers loyal to former Vice Pres Riek Machar tried to overthrow the government, continuing the political tension that has hung over the fledgling country for months.
lead_paragraph: President Salva Kiir said that soldiers loyal to the former vice president had tried to orchestrate a coup but that his government was firmly in control.

headline.main: President Says a Coup Failed in South Sudan
headline.print_headline: President Says A Coup Failed In South Sudan

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
